game.name: Cats Hidden in Germany
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Color Alternatives, Custom Volume Controls, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Touch Only Option, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 아늑한 중세 독일 곳곳에 숨겨진 고양이 100마리를 찾아보세요! 이 귀엽고 손으로 그린 숨은그림찾기 게임은 원조 바이럴 ‘숨은 고양이’ 게임의 창작자 Travellin Cats가 만들었습니다! 전부 찾을 수 있을까요?
game.shortDescriptionEn: Find 100 cats hiding in cosy medieval Germany in this cute hand-drawn hidden object game by Travellin Cats - the original viral hidden cats game creator! Can you find them all?

reviewHighlights.text: I finished the game quickly, but no complaints. Very enjoyable. :) I think the only issue I'm having with games of this nature (and I have A LOT of th...
harder than others, but really nice to look at ♡ this one was definitely more challenging 〜 some of the cats had me staring at the screen way longer t...
